kit.leader_skill: Super TEQ Type Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +90%

super_attack.name: Kamehameha
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage; A high chance of stunning the enemy

passive_skill.name: Yamcha's Strategy
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) High chance of evading enemy's attack; (Forever) High chance of performing a critical hit; Per "Tournament Participants" or "Turtle School" Category ally on the team (depending on which Category has more members): ATK & DEF 50% up (up to 250%); When there is another "Tournament Participants" or "Turtle School" Category ally attacking in the same turn: Ki +4; Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up; Launches an additional Super Attack; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 200% up; When HP is 86% or more: DEF 200% up; Damage reduction rate 20% up; When HP is 86% or less: ATK 200% up; Chance of performing a critical hit 50% up

lines.text: Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up
lines.context: When there is another "Tournament Participants" or "Turtle School" Category ally attacking in the same turn
